laboratory_examinations.findings: The proband was homozygous for SLC18A3 c.1078G.C, p.Gly360Arg, which is not reported in world populations but has a carrier frequency of 1:30 in healthy Yemeni Jews.
Demonstrated delayed myelination with normal size and structure of ventricles and corpus callosum.
Normal head ultrasounds were observed at the first 3 months of life. Brain atrophy was first noticed at 3 months.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Normal at 1, 2, and 3 months, with subsequent brain atrophy noted at 3 months.

laboratory_examinations.findings: Hearing threshold of 60 dB in the right ear and 80 dB in the left ear, with prolonged absolute latencies and interpeak interval for waves I to VI.
